definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Under certain situation the equivalence of open set condition and strong open set condition are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章討論開集條件與強開集條件是否等價的問題。

sentences.english: The self-similar sets satisfying the open condition have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 討論了滿足開集條件的自相似集。

sentences.english: The boundary of A contains a nonempty open set.
sentences.chinese: 的邊界包含一個非空開集。
